name: Super Star Wars
description:
Enhanced for the PlayStation®Vita system with new save features, leaderboards, trophies, and updated display and controller options!
Risk your life as a Jedi Knight!
Join Luke, Han, and Chewbacca in their fierce war against the evil Empire. Battle treacherous aliens. Pilot two vehicles in high-speed, first-person, 3-D sequences. Fight your way through the wastelands of Tatooine to the hostile streets of Mos Eisley and beyond. So grab your blaster, strap on your lightsaber, and take on the fight for galactic freedom.
Purchasing this content entitles you to both the PS4™ system and “PS Vita” system versions!
Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV
1 player(s)
100KB Minimum
Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.
